posts.post_content:

posts.post_content:
I really don't understand.  
a 4/4 artifact for 5 is, in fact, just fairly costed. See Stone Golem, an *uncommon*. even green doesn't get 6/6 for 6 at common, it seems ridiculous that blue and white should.  
  
If anything, Artifacts should cost one or two mana more than the equivalent creature in red or white.  
Chrome steed was crazy.  
  
I swear, it's like Eldrazi spoiled you.  
"We should get at *least* power and toughness equal to the casting cost under any conditions!"  
  
Jegus, red doesn't even get 2/2s for less than two colored mana.

Posted By: Gavrilo (1/28/2011 12:57:39 AM)

posts.post_content:
I feel like they missed the pricing mark here. If it was 5 I'd think better of it - 4/4 for 5 is a tad on the overcosted side, 6/6 for 5 is a tad on the undercosted, so it incentivizes Metalcraft without making it necessary to not have a bad creature.   
  
I felt similarly for Chrome Steed (like it should've been 3) but the error's more significant here, when 6 mana should be significantly changing the game, not just putting out another big butt.
posts.html:

I felt similarly for Chrome Steed (like it should've been 3) but the error's more significant here, when 6 mana should be significantly changing the game, not just putting out another big butt.
